games.longDescription:
Strong racing cars, detailed modification options, and tough races are waiting for you with the Grand City Racing game! There are three game modes: Racing, Challenge, and Free Drive. You can play single-player or two-player.

Single-player:
Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS"
NOS: "F"
Look back: "T"
Fix car's position: "R"
Handbrake: "SPACE"

Player 1:
Move: "W,A,S,D"
NOS: "F"
Look back: "T"
Fix car's position: "R"
Handbrake: "SPACE"

Player 2:
Move: "ARROW KEYS"
NOS: "K"
Look back: "L"
Fix car's position: "O"
Handbrake: "RIGHT-SHIFT"

In Racing mode, there are ten races with varying rewards. Challenge mode has four time-attack races. Free Drive mode features a large map with stunt ramps, money stacks, circles, and mountain roads. In the garage, you can customize paint, rims, decals, and upgrade engine parts for better performance. Have fun!
games.shortDescription: Grand City Racing is a racing game with 3 modes: Racing, Challenge, Free Drive.
games.title: Grand City Racing

games.longDescription:
Hazmob FPS is an action-packed tactical war game released on mobile and web. Each player can create strategies and join team battles in various game modes with realistic mechanics and competitive rankings.

Single-player:
Movement: "W,A,S,D"
Jump: "SPACE"
Shoot: "LEFT-MOUSE"
AIM: "RIGHT-MOUSE"
Leaderboard / Pause / Settings: "P"
Pick up weapon: "G"
Crouch: "C"
Run: "SHIFT"
Switch weapons: "1,2,3"
Skills: "4,5,6"
Alternative skill: "E"
Alternative skill: "Q"

Take your place in the team and start the fight!
games.shortDescription: Hazmob FPS is a tactical first-person shooter with fast-paced action.
games.title: Hazmob FPS

games.longDescription:
Temple Run 2 is an endless running adventure where you must escape from a cursed idol while dodging cliffs, mines, and traps. Test your reflexes as you run, jump, slide, and turn across dangerous paths. Collect coins, unlock characters, and upgrade abilities to run further.

Single-player:
Move Left: "Left Arrow" or "Swipe Left"
Move Right: "Right Arrow" or "Swipe Right"
Jump: "Up Arrow" or "Swipe Up"
Slide: "Down Arrow" or "Swipe Down"
Activate Power: "Spacebar" or "Click Power Icon"
games.shortDescription: Temple Run 2 is a thrilling endless runner with obstacles, coins, and power-ups.
games.tags: endless runner, arcade, pc, adventure, embedded
games.title: Temple Run 2

games.longDescription:
Subway Surfers is a classic endless runner where you dash across train tracks, dodge obstacles, and collect coins while being chased by a grumpy inspector and his dog. Unlock characters, boards, and boosters to extend your run. Colorful visuals and smooth gameplay make it addictive fun.

Single-player:
Move Left: "Left Arrow" or "Swipe Left"
Move Right: "Right Arrow" or "Swipe Right"
Jump: "Up Arrow" or "Swipe Up"
Slide: "Down Arrow" or "Swipe Down"
Activate Power-up: "Spacebar" or "Tap Power Icon"
games.shortDescription: Dash, dodge, and surf your way through train tracks in this fast-paced endless runner.
games.tags: endless runner, arcade, casual, pc, embedded
games.title: Subway Surfers
